changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE FILMS( id serial PRIMARY KEY, name varchar(50) NOT NULL, genre varchar(130) NOT NULL, director_id integer NOT NULL, duration_in_minutes integer NOT NULL, description varchar(255), release_date timestamp WITH time ZONE DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE, rating_IMDB double NOT NULL, age_Limit integer, country_id integer NOT NULL, date_of_creation timestamp WITH time ZONE DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE, date_of_change timestamp WITH time ZONE DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE, CONSTRAINT ct_film UNIQUE(name, director_id), CONSTRAINT fk_country FOREIGN KEY (country_id) REFERENCES COUNTRIES(id), CONSTRAINT fk_director FOREIGN KEY (director_id) REFERENCES DIRECTORS(id) );
